ratatouille.ponder.irrigation_tower.head: Use irrigation towers to keep farmland moist
ratatouille.ponder.irrigation_tower.text: Irrigation towers maintain optimal moisture levels for farmland within their range
The tank need to be filled with water
ratatouille.ponder.oven.header: Efficient Food Baking with the Oven
ratatouille.ponder.oven.text_1: The oven heated by blaze burner
ratatouille.ponder.oven.text_2: Oven fans ensure sufficient air within the oven
ratatouille.ponder.oven.text_3: With sufficient heat, air, and stocked inventory...
ratatouille.ponder.oven.text_4: ...It can efficiently bake all types of food!
ratatouille.ponder.oven.text_5: Higher efficiency demands more space, heat, and airflow
ratatouille.ponder.oven.text_6: Use goggles to monitor the current oven level
ratatouille.ponder.spreader.header: Accelerate Crop Growth with the Spreader
ratatouille.ponder.spreader.text_1: The spreader rapidly ripens crops within its designated range
ratatouille.ponder.spreader.text_2: Each grown action consumes one bone meal
ratatouille.ponder.spreader.text_3: By adjusting speed and attach nozzle, you can significantly expand the ripening area
ratatouille.ponder.squeeze_basin.header: Process Items Efficiently Using the Squeeze Basin
ratatouille.ponder.squeeze_basin.text_1: Squeeze basins handle squeezing and filling tasks
ratatouille.ponder.squeeze_basin.text_2: Output products typically emerge from the side with a port
ratatouille.ponder.squeeze_basin.text_4: For specific recipes, consider filling the output port with items
ratatouille.ponder.thresher.header: Efficient Grain Processing with the Thresher
ratatouille.ponder.thresher.text_1: Threshers are versatile machines used for processing various crops
ratatouille.ponder.thresher.text_2: Processed grain conveniently slides out from the side through the output slot
ratatouille.ponder.thresher.text_3: The thresher operates effectively with mechanical belt
